name: Heavy Tank Shooter vs Police Car Attacker
name_original: Heavy Tank Shooter vs Police Car Attacker
description:
This is a real tank shooting game ,which is allow you to experience the most challenging police chase on the road. Commando tank shooting is a convenient and sensitive operation of attack simulator shooting game. You will protect your city from enemy and stopping from crimes. Your mission is to destroy cars as many as possible while getting survival as long as possible. You are an army commando warrior entered in enemy city with your army tank. No one can handle the situation in this place, but you can do. There police attack on your tank with elite class swat force to destroy your tank. You save your tank and destroy all of the elite force police cars and complete your mission for unlock your next adventurous missions. You have a reputation to maintain, and a city to save! Lawful citizens and peaceful. Show the gangsters, bandits, mafia members and other outlaws that the punishing hand knows no mercy, destroy them through rare tank. Defeat enemies and be the best driver tank.
This is realistic driving experience and feelings. In this game also used realistic sound environment and realistic physics. Your dream may come true in this action and simulation game. We hope you will enjoy this amazing real simulator game.
Features:
1. Real 3d HD city environment
2. Amazing background sound effects.
3. Stunning 3D graphics
4.Also used zoom Button
5.Different Challenging Levels
